title: pbe 8.15: The annual meme Lee 'LCS' Sin buffs are coming
body:
With worlds right around the corner

Lee Sin

    Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike (Q)
         (Q1) + (Q2) AD ratio increased from 90% bAD to 100% bAD
         (Q1) + (Q2) damage lowered from 55/85/115/145/175 to 50/75/100/125/150
        [NEW] Resonating Strike (Q2) now deals up to 100% increased damage based on target's missing health.
             Resonating Strike damage changed from from [55/85/115/145/175 (+90% bAD)] to [50/75/100/125/150 (+100% bAD) to 100/150/200/250/300 (+200% bAD) based on targets missing health]
        [Removed]  Resonating Strike (Q2) No longer deals 8% of target's missing health as damage.

"We don't balance for LC$" 

signed Ghostcrawler and Meddler
